item.title: Help making talking npcs!
item.dc:creator: @wed330 wed330
item.description:
@wed330 wrote:

Hey, can i please have some help, i need to make a talking NPC, in the correct area, but to be honest i dont entirely understand it, so i have this in NPC handler:(this is an example not what i want)

                if (npcs[i].npcType == 945) {
                    if (misc.random2(30) <= 2) {
                        npcs[i].updateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdateRequired = true;
                        npcs[i].textUpdate = "You Finally Made It here..Keep up the Good Work!";
                    }
                }

So i don’t understand where it gets the NPC location from? Will +rep any succesfull helpers!

Read full topic
